Table of Contents

Name

arj-register - Register the ARJ archiver

Synopsis

arj-register [options] program_name

Options

-arj
Registers all ARJ for Linux programs in the current directory.
-arj32
Registers all ARJ32 (supplied by ARJ Software, Inc.) programs in the current directory.

See Also

arj(1) .

Author

This manual page was written by Ola Lundqvist <opal@debian.org> in pod format, then converted by Guillem Jover <guillem@debian.org> to nroff format.
